name: A Bird Story
descr:
[b]Note:[/b] This is not To the Moon's sequel, but rather a small experimental project.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

From the creator of To the Moon and Finding Paradise: A [b]simple, wordless 1-hour short[/b] about a boy who found an injured bird, told through a blur between reality and imagination.

A Bird Story is an [b]interactive pixel animation[/b] with the sole purpose of telling a simple story. It is a standalone narrative, with its own beginning and ending. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
A word of caution from the devs: This is an experimental and somewhat polarizing project, particularly for fans of To the Moon & Finding Paradise. As a guarantee with all games from Freebird, there is a [b]100% personal (confidential) refund policy[/b] with no questions asked; even if it just isn't your cup of tea. Details [url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/327410/discussions/0/613941122665882456/]here.[/url]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------[h2] Key Features[/h2][list][li]A story-driven experience with no dialogues
[/li][li]A mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aesthetics
[/li][li]An original soundtrack tailored to the narrative
[/li][li]An espresso execution with no time drains [/li][/list]
detail:
名称: A Bird Story
类型: 冒险, 独立, 角色扮演
开发商: Freebird Games
发行商: Freebird Games
系列: To the Moon Series
发行日期: 2014 年 11 月 7 日
review: 最近评测: 特别好评 (33) - 过去 30 天内的 33 篇用户评测中有 87% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (7,189) - 此游戏的 7,189 篇用户评测中有 84% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (7,189 篇中的 84%) 发布至今
最近评测: 特别好评 (33 篇中的 87%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统: XP, Vista, 7, 8
处理器: > Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: 1024x768 High Color +
DirectX 版本: 9.0
存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
附注事项: Usually runs on anything more than a baked potato.

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: OS X 10.6.8
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: Radeon HD 2400 or comparable
存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
附注事项: Usually runs on anything more than a baked potato.

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: Radeon HD 2400 or comparable
存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
附注事项: This too usually runs on anything more than a baked potato; but one that you'd have to do the baking yourself and potentially tasting better afterwards.
